content.Cancel:
You’re {Type} {Amount} Constant at {Price} {Currency} per Constant.

If you want to cancel this order, please click the “Cancel order” button below. Otherwise, please close this window.
content.Approve:
You’re buying {Amount} Constant at {Price} {Currency} per Constant.

If you’ve sent {Total} {Currency} to the seller’s bank account, please click “Confirm payment” below.

Otherwise, please send {Total} {Currency} to the seller’s bank account. Remember to include your reference number in the transfer description.

Bank Name: {bank_name}
Account Name: {bank_account_name}
Account Number: {bank_account_number}
Amount: {Total} {Currency}
Reference: {Reference}

IMPORTANT: If you don’t complete your transfer within 30 minutes, your order will be cancelled. This protects you and our network from misuse.
content.Finish:
You’re selling {Amount} Constant at {Price} {Currency} per Constant.

If you’ve received a bank transfer for {TotalVND} {Currency}, you can now send your Constant to the buyer by clicking the button below.

IMPORTANT: Please do not send your Constant until you’ve received the bank transfer from the buyer. If the buyer doesn’t pay you within 30 minutes of placing the order, please email us at hello@constant.money.

review.title: Review

label.description: How is your experience with Constant?

review.thanksMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent.

home.blockDesc1: How people are using Constant as their primary saving
home.blockCap2: Enjoy an interest rate 60x the national average.
home.blockDesc2: Like other banks, we reward you with interest earnings on our risk-free loans. Unlike other banks, we give you most of it - since it’s your money, really. And because we replaced cashiers with code, advisors with algorithms, and run on smart contracts and electricity - we don’t need much.
home.blockCap3: We’re building a fairer, freer, financial system.

howItWorks.desc1: Deposit any amount in your currency of choice (USD, HKD, VND) or cryptocurrencies (USDT, GUSD, etc). No minimum deposit, no fees.
howItWorks.desc2: Pick a term that works for you. Keep your money safe with us in a 3-mo, 6-mo, 1-year fixed deposit, or stay flexible with an anytime account.
howItWorks.desc3: Leave it and forget about it, or check your balance daily to see your savings grow. When your term is up, withdraw anytime to any bank account - or rollover and continue earning.

buy.title: Buy
buy.subintroDesc1: Pegged to the most stable, useable currency in the world, Constant never loses value.
buy.subintroDesc2: Every Constant is backed by USD, independently held by a US accredited financial custodian, subject to regular audits.
buy.subintroDesc3: All users are fully FDIC and US treasury insured, regardless of amount.
buy.subintroDesc4: Constant moves instantly from your account to anyone, anywhere in the world. For free.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.caption: SEND CONSTANT ANYWHERE
transfer.subTitle: Free. To anyone, anywhere.
transfer.introTitle: Send money to anyone, anywhere. For free.
transfer.phToAddress: Recipient’s email or Ethereum wallet address
transfer.confirmMsg: Are you sure you want to transfer {amount} CONSTANT to {address}?
transfer.transferFailed: Failed while transfering, please try again
transfer.subintroDesc1: Constant is a digital currency, so you can send it to anyone, anywhere in the world - within minutes.
transfer.subintroDesc2: You can send any amount of Constant to anyone at anytime, for free.
transfer.subintroDesc3: Unlike other digital currencies, Constant keeps a stable value. This means you can get the equivalent of 1 USD for 1 Constant. In any location, at any time.

constantLoan.headLine: Want to pay off your credit cards, medical bills or rent? Simply enter the amount of constant you want to borrow and make a deposit in ETH, which will be held securely in the Constant loan smart contact.

home.topBannerSubtext: Hold your money in USD and enjoy free international transfers. 100% insured.
home.midBannerTitle: Constant can help you get more out of your money.
home.midBanner0: Protect the value of your money
home.whatTitle: What can you do with Constant?
home.whatDesc1: You are completely insured by the FDIC and US treasury. No matter how much Constant you have.
home.whatDesc0: No matter where in the world you are, your Constant keeps the value of the USD. And you can withdraw in your local currency anytime.
home.whatDesc2: Keep your money safe with a chartered, regulated, US financial institution, subject to frequent audits.
home.whatDesc3: No limits, no fees. Constant moves instantly from your account to anyone, anywhere in the world. For free.
home.whatStudentTitle: What can you do with Constant?
home.whatStudentSubTitle: Sending or receiving funds internationally can be an absolute nightmare. Here’s the solution.
home.whatStudentDesc0: Constant makes it easier to pay tuition fees, get monthly living expenses, or receive gifts for special occasions. Receive funds from home instantly, for free. You can always convert Constant to USD at any time. 1 Constant = 1 USD, always.
home.whatStudentDesc1: We’re proud of this one. Constant allows you to instantly send your earnings back home, or to anyone, anywhere, at any time. For free. Secured using blockchain technologies, free from centralized control.
home.whatStudentDesc2: Split a dinner bill, pay for room and board, place a fun bet.  With Constant, sending or receiving payments is streamlined, and incurs zero fees.
home.whatStudentDesc3: It’s safe, quick, easy and cost effective to use Constant. Constant is available 24/7 on both web and mobile. No closing times, no bank holidays.

referral_program.description: Both parties will instantly receive 100 HKD once the referred person buys or converts at least 1,000 HKD worth of Constant.

commission.title: Commission

promotion_programs.textRequireLogin: Get your referral link to share and earn Constant. Sign in now to get your unique link.

pwaInstallRequest.msg: Add the Constant app to your home screen for easy access.

pwaInstallRequest.added: Added! Now you can easily access the Constant mobile web app.

referralPage.headerDesc: We provide an affordable transfer money service
referralPage.introTitle3: Invite some friends to join Constant
referralPage.howItWorkDesc:
- Start by visiting the referrals page. From this page you can copy your referral link and send it to your friends.

- Your friends can click the referral link and sign up an account on Constant.

- They will initiate a transaction via Constant.

- As soon as your friend initiates a first overseas transaction via Constant, you will receive a 5 Const referral bonus when the transaction completes.
referralPage.moreDetailsDesc:
- In just one click you can share your referral link via Facebook, Twitter, or anywhere

- Referral links look just like a link to https://constant.money/ except they have special code on the end to identify your account. For example: https://constant.money/referral/YOUR_REFERRAL_ID

- There is no limit to the number of friends you can refer, although we do reserve the right to adjust or change the referral program rules in the future.
referralPage.gamificationDesc:
- Sign up an account

- Purchase Constant (+5 CST for first order)

- Invite some friends to join Constant ( +5 CST for each friend with at least 1 successful overseas transfer)

affiliatePage.headerDescNoLogin: Let’s earn up to 0.15% of volume users made
affiliatePage.headerDescLogined: Welcome to our affiliate program, let’s start to earn
affiliatePage.termConditionDesc:
Agent will immediately earn $5 for the first transaction of acquired users. After that, Agent will earn 0.15% of volume users made in that month as commission.

User A conducts the first transaction which is BUYING CONSTANT and the amount must be equal to or greater than $1,000, then Agent will immediately earn $5. After that, User A makes the next transaction as BUYING CONSTANT, and Agent will earn 0.15% of each purchase. Total volume of User A in the month must be greater than $2000. Commission will be paid at the end of the month.

options.1: Send verification request to my lawyer, CPA, investment adviser or broker
options.2: Upload document (in English or with English Translation)
options.3: Send verification request to my lawyer, CPA, investment adviser or broker
options.4: Upload a credit report stating your liabilities that is dated within the last 30 days.

proSaving.agreement: I authorize AngelList in writing to periodically obtain my credit report for a transaction I am initiating. AngelList may use this data and share it with any issuer solely to verify my investor status in compliance with SEC requirements.
proSaving.accreditation_evidence_location: Do you have a U.S. Social Security Number?
proSaving.accreditationAlt: Required by U.S. law for investing in 506(c) fundraisings
proSaving.desc1: We require proof of accreditation from you that meets the more stringent standard the SEC has put in place – the 506(c) standard – which should work for all accredited deals, including ones that publicly discuss their financing.

income.title: Income
income.description: Income of $200k, or $300k with spouse, in each of past 2 years and expecting same or more this year

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Net worth of $1M, individually or joint with spouse, excluding your primary residence

proSaving.text2: They'll be asked to confirm that they have seen evidence of your claimed status. No documentation required.
proSaving.text3: W2, 1040, other IRS or foreign tax authority document containing salary for the past 2 years (2017 and 2018), or a letter from your lawyer, accountant, investment advisor, or investment broker
proSaving.text4: Upload a statement from a financial institution, asset appraisals, or letter from your lawyer, accountant, investment advisor or investment broker indicating net assets
proSaving.accreditation_evidence_allow_credit_repo: I authorize AngelList in writing to periodically obtain my credit report for a transaction I am initiating. AngelList may use this data and share it with any issuer solely to verify my investor status in compliance with SEC requirements.
proSaving.popover1:
Income Levels must be met for each tax year individually (the SEC does not allow averaging across years)

If married filing jointly, either a joint income of at least $300k/year must be shown across spouses or the investing individual's W-2s must show a minimum income of $200k/year

If W2's are provided for a married couple, evidence of marriage must be provided (such as joint-filed 1040)

homeWhatwedo.desc:
As pioneers of borderless banking on the blockchain, we are committed to making banking more inclusive, money more useful, and growth more accessible to anyone, anywhere in the world.



What does that look like? Fair interest rates. Inclusive loans. A state-less, stable currency that you can save, borrow, and spend. Transactions secured and carried out collectively by users of the network. A bank for the people, made possible by the people.



Constant is proud to be 100% digital, online 24/7. So no queuing at bank branches, and no bank holidays. Our team of economists, designers, engineers and industry experts write code, policy and efficient software in major cities around the globe. If you’re in the neighborhood, drop by anytime.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.question1: Which countries can I get Constant in?
faqs.answer1: Anywhere in the world. You just need an internet connection.
faqs.answer2: Anywhere in the world. You just need an internet connection.
faqs.question3: Is Constant insured? What if you get hacked, or I can’t convert to USD, or my Constant is stolen?
faqs.answer3:
The US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to $1305,000,000 by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond.


Blockchain technology is very difficult to hack, but even if it happens, we can trace the transaction before the hack to see what happened thanks to the immutable blockchain ledger. So, you will get your USD
faqs.question4: Can I see how many Constant are in circulation?
faqs.answer4:
The US dollars put in escrow are FDIC (Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation) insured. Each account is insured up to $1305,000,000 by the independent trust company’s financial institution bond.


Blockchain technology is very difficult to hack, but even if it happens, we can trace the transaction before the hack to see what happened thanks to the immutable blockchain ledger. So, you will get your USD

account.question1: Can I open a Constant account in my country?
account.answer1: Anyone can open a Constant account, no matter where you live. All you need is an internet connection.
account.question2: How do I open a Constant account?
account.answer2: Simply register with an email address and password to get started. To withdraw, transfer, and otherwise get the full use out of your account, you’ll need to verify your ID, which shouldn’t take more than a few minutes.
account.question3: Do I need a minimum deposit?
account.answer3: No, you can deposit any amount you want. Better yet, once you’ve opened your account, we’ll give you a trial deposit of $1,000 so you can start earning interest immediately. The deposit is returned to us at the end of your term (sorry!), but you keep the interest. Not bad, right?
account.question4: Do you need to verify my identity?
account.answer4: You can open a Constant account without verifying your identity. However, to withdraw your savings (and any earned interest) to a bank account, we will need to verify your identity. We do this to protect you from fraud and to comply with financial regulations.
account.question5: How do I reset my password?
account.answer5: Go to the Login page and click “Forgotten your password?”. Then enter your email address and we will send you instructions on how to reset your password. If you can’t see our email after a few minutes, please check your spam/junk folder.
account.question6: Do I need to connect my bank account / bank info?
account.answer6: You don't need a bank account to use Constant. However, if you withdraw Constant to USD (or local equivalent), you will need to enter the receiving bank account details. For additional security, we don't store this information for future transactions.

trialDeposit.question1: Is the trial deposit still available?
trialDeposit.answer1: Yes, the trial deposit is available until further notice. We’ll keep it going for as long as we can.
trialDeposit.question2: Am I eligible for this promotion?
trialDeposit.answer2: As long as you’re a new customer and haven’t accepted a trial deposit before, you are eligible.
trialDeposit.answer3: While we’d love to give you $1,000, we can’t. So unfortunately, you can’t withdraw the trial deposit. The $1,000 will be returned to us at the end of your savings term, but you keep the interest, which is still a pretty good deal.
trialDeposit.question4: How can I track the interest from this program?
trialDeposit.answer4: Just log into your account and click Your Savings. Total interest earned is on the top right of the dashboard.
trialDeposit.question5: What happens at the end of my term?
trialDeposit.answer5: At the end of the term, we’ll pay you the interest (assuming you haven’t withdrawn it already) and the $1,000 deposit will be returned.
trialDeposit.question6: Can I deposit money into my trial plan?
trialDeposit.answer6: No, but you can add new Savings Plans whenever you like.
trialDeposit.question7: Can my other deposits have a different term to the trial deposit?
trialDeposit.answer7: Absolutely! Your trial deposit is separate to your other Savings Plans, so you can choose the amounts and terms for your other deposits.

save.question1: What is a Constant Savings Plan?
save.answer1: Our Savings Plans are simple, risk-free, and effective ways to grow your money. You choose a savings term, deposit your money, and at the end of the term you get your money back plus earned interest. It really is as simple as that.
save.question2: How do Constant Savings Plans work?
save.answer2:
Under the “SAVE” tab on our website, you’ll be able to choose from several different Savings Plans. Each one is designed to maintain the value of your deposit and pay you daily interest.


To maintain the value of your deposit, we send your money to the Constant trust where it’s protected by US law and insured to $130,000,000. At the same time, we create a “digital dollar” called Constant and put it into your account, which keeps the value stable.


Over time, your Constant earns interest which you can withdraw as you earn (daily) or save until the end of your term. Either way, your savings balance is an amount in Constant you can withdraw for its 1:1 equivalent in USD.


Of course, you don’t have to withdraw your savings as USD. At the end of your term, we put your savings into our Anytime Savings Plan so you continue to earn interest while you decide what to do next.


You could send your Constant to someone else, anywhere in the world, keep it stored in your Constant current account to keep the value locked to the USD, or simply put the Constant back into another Savings Plan to earn even more interest. The choice is yours!
save.question3: How do you protect my savings?
save.answer3: Your deposits are securely held in the Constant Vault, which is overseen by an accredited US financial institution called Prime Trust. The Constant Vault is FDIC-insured to $130,000,000. You can read more about the Constant Vault on our blog.
save.answer4: We accept any currency sent to our US-based Constant Vault bank account. It is then converted to USD and stored in an FDIC-insured vault.
save.question6: Can I access my savings at any time?
save.answer6:
To give you the best interest rates, we hold on to your deposit for the duration of your savings term. Think of your savings deposit as a seed that we water and help grow. To do that, we need time, which is why we offer different Savings Plans so you can find the right one for you.


If you’d rather have continuous access to your savings, choose our Anytime Savings Plan – the rate is lower, but you can withdraw your money at any time.
save.question7: Why do you digitize my savings?
save.answer7:
When you deposit money for the long term, some local currencies can lose value due to inflation. This eats into your earned interest and makes saving feel like an uphill battle. We don’t think that’s fair. So instead, we convert your money into a “digital dollar” that’s 100% backed by real USD – the world’s reserve currency.


Our digital dollar is called Constant. Anytime you deposit or withdraw, we create or destroy Constant to ensure it’s 1:1 backed, so its value always matches the USD. That way, you never need worry about inflation and other economic pressures eating into your savings. You just sit back and watch your money grow.
save.answer8:
First, we send your deposit to the Constant trust for safekeeping. Then, we create new Constant tokens on the Ethereum blockchain that match the USD value of your deposit. For example, if you gave us the equivalent of $100 in your local currency, we send $100 to the Constant trust and create 100 Constant.


Constant remains in your account for your savings term, accruing interest which you can save or withdraw daily. Then, when your term ends, you can withdraw your money from the Constant trust (and any interest) and we’ll destroy the Constant. Or, if you’d rather use the Constant tokens to send money abroad, trade on exchanges, or simply save for another term, please do!
save.answer9: Your savings are stored inside the Constant Vault, which is regulated under US law and protected by $130,000,000 FDIC insurance.
save.question10: Can I add to my Savings Plan during the term?
save.answer10: You can’t add to your Savings Plan once it’s started, but there’s no limit on how many Savings Plans you can have. So if you’d like to save more, simply open another Savings Plan and watch your money grow.
save.answer11: The Constant Vault is a publicly-audited trust overseen and managed by Prime Trust, a US accredited financial institution. The Constant Vault is regulated in the US and insured by the FDIC to the value of $130,000,000.
save.answer12: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) is a body set up by the US government to protect the integrity of the US financial system. It does this in a number of ways, including insuring deposits. Our Constant Vault is insured by FDIC to an indemnity limit of $130,000,000. You can read more about the FDIC on their website.

interest.question1: How often do you pay interest?
interest.answer1: We pay interest daily, so you can either wait until the end of your term to withdraw interest or withdraw it daily. It’s up to you.
interest.answer2: Your interest is calculated by applying the percentage rate of your Savings Plan to the amount of your deposit, and then dividing it by 365 to get a daily rate. Interest is not compounded, so if you deposit $500 for one year at an interest rate of 6%, you would earn $30 at the end of your term (about $0.08 per day).
interest.question3: How can I track interest on my savings?
interest.answer3: Just log into your account and click Your Savings. Total interest earned is on the top right of the dashboard.
interest.question4: Will you increase interest rates in the future?
interest.answer4:
You never know ;-)


As Constant grows, we’re always looking for new ways of improving our efficiency so we can give you the best savings rates in the world.
interest.question5: Why are your interest rates better than those offered by banks?
interest.answer5:
Like other banks, we reward you with interest earnings on our risk-free loans. We can afford to give you more than banks because, one, we believe you deserve it, and two, we operate a much leaner business model.


We’ve replaced cashiers with code, advisors with algorithms, and run on smart contracts and electricity – we’re an efficient team and don’t need much. Maybe some snacks. Yes, please send us snacks.

general.answer1:
Constant is a simple, risk-free way to grow, send, borrow, and save money – like a bank, only better.


We’ve thrown out credit scoring, paperwork, and fees to give you more of what you deserve – industry-beating interest rates, risk-free loans, a stable, state-less currency, and free international transfers. Available all day, every day, anywhere in the world.


In short, we’ve rewired the world’s banking system to put you at the core.
general.answer2:
No. Constant is even better.


We’re 100% digital and open 24-7, so no queuing at bank branches, and no bank holidays.


We pay interest on your savings at 60x the national average.


We don’t run credit checks, we don’t give you reams of paperwork to sign, and we are open to anyone, anywhere.
general.answer3: Yes. Your deposits are held securely in our trust, which is regulated under US law. That’s why we ask you to verify your identity when you withdraw savings to your bank account.
general.answer4: We charge interest on collateralized loans in order to pay our savers their earnings, and make a very slim profit from the difference.
general.question5: Who are the people behind Constant?
general.answer5: We’re a diverse team of engineers, economists, monetary policymakers, and industry experts. You can read all about our team on <page>.
general.answer6: Everywhere! We are a registered US entity supported by a global team with presences in the USA, Vietnam, Malta and Singapore. If you’re in our neighborhood, drop by anytime.

stories.quote1: “I’ve never used anything like Constant before. The interest rate is high. Everything is good. Your money will be protected well and be much more profitable than traditional bank saving.
stories.quote2: Secure, transparent, quick and easy to use. Competitive rates.
stories.quote3: Good interest rates, very efficient and friendly staff. It was really helpful being able to talk things through over the phone.
stories.quote4: The website is clear and easy navigate, but it would be useful to have an app to make it quicker to check up on my account from my phone. The rates for the savings account are excellent especially if you are able to commit to a fixed time frame.
stories.quote5: At first i felt a bit sceptical about trying something instead of a traditional bank, but everything has worked out smoothly so far. Clear, easy to follow set up instructions.
stories.quote6: Surprisingly painless - i set up my account and put a deposit in it in under 5 minutes.
